== Ayanivelikulangara (CT) (628369) ==

Ayanivelikulangara (CT) is a town in the [[Karunagappally]] taluka of [[Kollam]] district with an area of 9.44 sq. km. and harbouring 5982 households with total population of 24268 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kollam]] is at a distance of 22 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 98 km. Male population is 11664 and female population is 12604. Scheduled Caste population is 2337 and Scheduled Tribes population is 22. Census Location Code of the town is 628369<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kollam (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 22 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Thiruvananthapuarm (m corp. + og) at a distance of 98 km. Railway station is at Karunagappally at a distance of 1 km.
